numbered_ace_sentences: 1. Elite colleges pay attention to more than students' grades and test scores.
2. Elite colleges consider how wealthy the parents of a student are.
3. Elite colleges consider how poor the parents of a student are.
4. Elite colleges consider whether the parents of a student attended an elite school before.
5. I wonder why elite schools care about money more than grades and test scores.
6. This relates to me because I am a student.
7. I want to go to college.
8. I want to attend an elite school.
9. The headline is: Elite schools for the rich.
